channel.title: Viterra on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Viterra on FinanClub

item.title: A Viterra-Bunge Deal to Rescue Argentine Soy Giant Is Now at Risk
item.description: A deal to rescue Vicentin, one of the world’s largest soybean meal suppliers, is in jeopardy due to court delays and Argentina’s worst drought in living memory. The deal, which would have seen Viterra and Bunge take over Vicentin’s operations, was announced in March.
